pkgmetadata.longdescription: Tintin Palette Generator // Palettes generated from Tintin covers. There is one palette per cover, with a total of 24 palettes of 5 colours each. Includes functions to interpolate colors in order to create more colors based on the provided palettes.The data is based on Cyr, et al. (2004) doi:10.1503/cmaj.1041405 and Wikipedia https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Adventures_of_Tintin.
